title: krogothmanhattan
author: krogothmanhattan
created_time: January 08, 2023, 06:28:16 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 05:07:34 PM by krogothmanhattan
content: After seeing doblelebits hummingbird image https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418093.0 it got me into thinking to create this thread to show what physical bitcoin makers use as their symbols for their items. This is a short list of ones I did on the fly....so please feel free to contribute other and I will add so accordingly.         MANTIS CRYPTOSPRAYING MANTISRARITY CHECK MINT COINSCHECK MARK SURROUNDED BY DOTSDOBLEBITHUMMING BIRDPOLYMERBITSNOWFLAKESQUIRRELBITSSQUIRRELCYPHERHODLHOODED SATOSHI WITH A RISING BITCOIN SUN IN THE BACKGROUNDRAVENBITRAVENFINITE BY DESIGNF * DBITCOIN PENNYA BITCOIN PENNY IMAGEBTCCBTCCCRYPTOLATORA KEY HOLE INSIDE A C WITH A CURRENCY SYMBOLSHIBE MINTSHIBE INU NECT TO A FEDERAL RESERVE MINT BUILDINGALPEN COINPICTURE OF THE SWISS ALPS MOUNTAINMOONBITSMOONBITS PHYSICAL CRYPTOITOKAWA TIME BANKBEES SURROUNDING BTCMYBITSBITCOIN SYMBOL SURROUNDED BY LAUREL LEAFSMOPAR MINING LLCPICK AXE WITH CIRCUIT BOARD WIRING

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.created_time: January 08, 2023, 06:28:38 PMLast edit: January 09, 2023, 05:24:13 PM by krogothmanhattan
comments.body: So why did these makers pick their design?DobleBit  If a hummingbird is the only known bird that can fly backwards, they are considered guardians of time. Hummingbirds are agile and fast, flexible to adapt to changes and, above all, to emerge stronger from them. It is said that when a hummingbird flies in front of a person, it tries to show them the joy of life and the value of small thingshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5418093.msg61564995#msg61564995CYPHER HODL     I Used Cypher as an unknown...a blank...a mystery representing Satoshi....totally unkown person.        Hodl to Hodl you BTC no matter what.         I used a hooded image as an unkn own mysterious person who is unknown with BTC glasses to represent Satoshi Nakamoto       And in the backround you have the dawn and rise of the almighty Bitcoin sun. All complete in one logo that I copyrighted and trademarked. MANTIS CRYPTOS The inspiration came from mid-90s band "God Lives Underwater"The used a mantis as their unofficial logo on their albums and merchandiseThey met modest success with these 2 songs that were featured in movies, tv, games:

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Great idea for a thread - looking forward to seeing all the logos  Finite by Design

comments.author: Kryptowerk

comments.body: my own I used for the 7 poker chip wallets.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Thanks for submitting the images to add....if you have a story with why you are using the image for your product or story behind it, please submit as well.  Will be updating the OP tonight!
